verses.1: Tua ciangin Shuah gam mi Bildad in dawng a,
verses.2: “Pasian vanglian a, mi khempeuh in a zahtak ding ahi hi. Ama vantung kumpi gam, nuam takin a omsak zo hi.
verses.3: Ama na a sem vantung mite bangzah pha cih kua in sim zo ding ahi hiam? Pasianʼ khuavak in a bat lohna koi lai mun om ahi hiam?
verses.4: Pasianʼ muhna ah kua dik zo dinga, siangtho zo ding ahi hiam?
verses.5: Ama mitah khapi nangawn taang sa zo lo lai a, aksite nangawn siang sa zo lo lai hi.
verses.6: Tua ahihleh, lungno, ganhing no ahi lel mihing pen bangci ding ahi hiam? Mihing in Pasianʼ muhna ah bang man lel ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
